ygData.subject: RE: Re: another wild goose chase [Spoiler]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m pretty sure that his spawn point is underwater, however, me and 2 others (Lvl 20 bard, warrior, wizard) killed him on land, near one of the aviak huts
ygData.messageBody:
> Water Crystal Staff-> Webclaw Murkwave, Named mob underwater in Lake
> Rathe.
> you have to fight him underwater, and he is a caster. he will 32K if you
> pull
> him on land. (and i have heard that he 32k's if you don't kill him in a
> certain
> amount of time)
>
I'm pretty sure that his spawn point is underwater, however, me and
2 others (Lvl 20 bard, warrior, wizard) killed him on land, near one of the
aviak huts (I think in the SE corner of zone).


Bien
